info: Hello! My name is Marko, a 10 year old from Albania who enjoys games and programming. Before we start, there's 2 things i wanna say.  1: if you want my old website, it's here: https://marko2155.strangled.net/old.html 2: Every link on this domain has to be selected and manually copy-pasted into the address bar on your browser. Places where you can find me: YouTube: https://youtube.com/c/Marko2155 GitHub: https://github.com/Marko2155 Discord: marko2155 My games website: https://SPLASHStudios.github.io/ Projects: Excel ALU: https://marko2155.strangled.net/ALU.xlsx Redstone thing: https://marko2155.strangled.net/Redstone thing.zip Redstone computer: https://marko2155.strangled.net/Redstone computer.zip Hotel (structure): https://marko2155.strangled.net/hotel.mcstructure Hotel (world): https://marko2155.strangled.net/hotel.mcworld 2012 Google Chrome Speed Dial/New Tab webpage: https://marko2155.strangled.net/newtab-old-chrome MKernel: https://github.com/Marko2155/mkernel InfoGetSet (based off my website): https://github.com/Marko2155/InfoGetSet Welp, that's about it. If you wanna support me, be sure to download one of my games, projects or subscribe to my channel! See ya! Last updated 19/09/24
